g++    --std=c++11 -Ofast -fopenmp   CMakeFiles/pyro.dir/src/Camera.C.o CMakeFiles/pyro.dir/src/Grid.C.o CMakeFiles/pyro.dir/src/Image.C.o CMakeFiles/pyro.dir/src/Lighting.C.o CMakeFiles/pyro.dir/src/Matrix.C.o CMakeFiles/pyro.dir/src/Noise.C.o CMakeFiles/pyro.dir/src/OIIOFiles.C.o CMakeFiles/pyro.dir/src/PerlinNoise.C.o CMakeFiles/pyro.dir/src/Pyroclastic.C.o CMakeFiles/pyro.dir/src/Renderer.C.o CMakeFiles/pyro.dir/src/pyro.C.o  -o pyro  -L/group/dpa/local/openvdb/lib -rdynamic -lHalf -ltbb -lopenvdb -lOpenImageIO -Wl,-rpath,/group/dpa/local/openvdb/lib
